abstract: Delaware authorities say shooting of wheelchair-bound Jeremy McDole in Wilmington was justified because McDole pulled handgun on police; video of encounter does not make clear what McDole was doing at time of shooting.
lead_paragraph: The police killing of a man in a wheelchair was unjust, his mother said Thursday, but the authorities said the man was pulling a handgun from his waist when officers shot him.

headline.main: Delaware: Police Shoot Man in Wheelchair to Death
headline.print_headline: Delaware: Police Shoot Man in Wheelchair to Death

snippet: The police killing of a man in a wheelchair was unjust, his mother said Thursday, but the authorities said the man was pulling a handgun from his waist when officers shot him.
